stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 subroutines on a piece of ice protecting your mark. 2 credits: +2 strength.
text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you donʼt have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines on a piece of ice protecting your mark. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
title: Tunnel Vision
